Articles.Content:
I have an idea for a new part: Hydraulic system. It is a structural part that can use power for a slow change of its height (to some minimal and maximal length) or rotation.

This would fix a bunch of problems:

  1. Landing on slopes without falling over, especialy staying there
  2. Adjust for not precise set docking ports
  3. More flexible/easy multi-port docking (dock one central port, adjust rotation, expand the side-ports, dock)
